user.title: Big Sky Resort Configuration
user.description: Configure Big Sky Resort integration. Creating individual entities enables detailed control and automation but uses more resources. Default update interval is 15 minutes.

data.feed_url: Resort XML Feed URL (typically ends in /mtnxml/162)
data.create_lift_entities: Create separate entity for each lift (allows individual automation)
data.create_run_entities: Create separate entity for each trail (enables detailed status tracking)
data.update_interval: How often to fetch new data (in minutes)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one Big Sky Resort configuration is allowed.
abort.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to resort feed
